Quick Search of All Potions

Final Product Effect Description Antidote Neutralises the effects of all poisons. This concoction appears rather chewable, thick as it is with herbs and roots. Duergar Antidote Consume the potion to nullify the effects of certain Duergar poisons, grant Advantage on Saving Throws against being Poisoned, and grant Resistance to Poison damage. Concocted of rare ingredients that hasten the drinker's demise unless mixed correctly. Potion of Feather Fal
